title: Gwyneth Paltrow testifies in ski crash trial
description: Gwyneth Paltrow testifies about her accident with Terry Sanderson, which occurred at a ski slop in Utah on Feb. 26, 2016.

title: Kidnapped American couple being held at ransom in Haiti, family says
description: An American couple visiting Haiti is being held at ransom after being kidnapped on a bus nearly a week ago, according to their family.

title: Russians, American delayed in space to return in September
description: Russia's space agency says two cosmonauts and an astronaut who were supposed to leave the International Space Station this month will be brought back to Earth in late September

title: WATCH:  Watch this incredible video of 94-year-old going skydiving
description: Marge Wardenski isn't your typical 94-year-old.

title: Police release body camera footage showing fatal shooting of Timothy Johnson
description: Virginia police released body camera footage of the fatal officer-involved shooting of Timothy Johnson, a 37-year-old shoplifting suspect.

title: California ends some water limits after storms ease drought
description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom has ended some of the state water restrictions

title: Michigan 1st state in decades to repeal 'right-to-work' law
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer has signed legislation to repeal the state's decade-old “right-to-work” law, which was passed by a Republican-controlled Legislature

title: LGBTQ+ dating app Grindr issues warning to users in Egypt
description: A popular gay social networking application has issued a warning to its users in Egypt, as police impersonate community members to target and arrest LGBTQ+ individuals through digital platforms

title: Minors will need parental consent to open, maintain social media accounts in Utah
description: Two new Utah laws aim to restrict harm caused by social media to minors.

title: Pennsylvania school district sues Norfolk Southern over train derailment
description: Pennsylvania's Blackhawk School District sued Norfolk Southern over the East Palestine train derailment, alleging negligence.

title: Biden meets with Trudeau as US, Canada set to announce immigration agreement
description: Biden and Trudeau will hold a joint press conference after Biden addresses the Canadian Parliament

title: Biden, Trudeau meet on migration, China and more
description: President Joe Biden and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau are set to announce an agreement that aims to stem the flow of asylum seekers at unofficial crossings on the countries’ border

title: Police: Minnesota man fatally stabs wife during Bible study
description: A Minnesota man is charged with second-degree murder, accused of fatally stabbing his wife during a Bible study session

title: Top Trump aides ordered to testify as judge rejects claims of executive privilege
description: A judge has rejected former President Trump's claims of executive privilege, ordering Mark Meadows and other ex-aides to testify in the special counsel's Jan. 6 probe.

title: Ford's Tenn. plant could make 500K electric pickups per year
description: Ford says its new assembly plant being built in western Tennessee will be able to build up to 500,000 electric pickup trucks per year at full production

title: Kentucky governor vetoes sweeping GOP transgender measure
description: Kentucky’s Democratic governor has vetoed a sweeping Republican measure aimed at regulating the lives of transgender youths

title: 'Hotel Rwanda' hero Paul Rusesabagina to be released from prison
description: The Rwandan government announced Friday that Paul Rusesabagina, who inspired the acclaimed 2004 film "Hotel Rwanda," will be released from prison within 24 hours.

title: 4 ex-officers in Tyre Nichols case barred from police work
description: A state panel says four of five former Memphis police officers charged with murder in the beating death of Tyre Nichols cannot work as law enforcement officers again in Tennessee

title: UK watchdog softens position on Microsoft Activision deal
description: British antitrust regulators scrutinizing Microsoft’s blockbuster purchase of videogame maker Activision Blizzard have dropped concerns that the deal would hurt the console gaming market

title: Fiery Maryland tanker crash injures driver, closes lanes
description: Officials in Maryland say a fiery crash involving a tanker truck full of fuel briefly shut down the Interstate 795 expressway where it meets the Baltimore Beltway on Friday morning

title: Sex trafficking plea deal unending 'nightmare' for Texas mom
description: Irma Reyes feels like she can't wake up from nightmare

title: Dangerous tornado outbreak heads to the South: Latest forecast
description: A tornado outbreak is headed to the South, where intense, long-track tornadoes reaching EF-3 or higher are possible.

title: Suspected tornado touches down in northern Texas
description: Authorities say a suspected tornado touched down in north Texas as a storm system moving eastward threatens to spawn tornadoes in Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi and Tennessee

title: Nebraska trans health bill advances, despite filibuster vow
description: The Nebraska Legislature has advanced a contentious bill that would ban gender-affirming care for minors, despite threats from several lawmakers that they would filibuster the rest of the session

title: Dog walks itself home after visually impaired owner killed in hit-and-run, police say
description: A Tennessee dog walked itself home after its visually impaired owner was struck and killed by a pickup truck on their morning walk, police said.

title: King Charles III's European state visit hits French hurdle
description: King Charles III’s state visit to France has been postponed indefinitely amid widespread protests over President Emmanuel Macron’s pension reforms, putting a damper on the new monarch’s debut on the international stage

title: Man drives into pedestrians inside German airport garage
description: Police say a motorist has driven into several pedestrians in a parking garage at Cologne-Bonn Airport in western Germany

title: WATCH:  Girl makes big catch on 1st fishing trip with dad
description: Matt Brewster’s 9-year-old daughter Ali burst into tears of joy after catching a nearly five-and-a-half-pound bass on their trip together.

title: WATCH:  Inside world’s 1st 3-year cruise around the globe
description: The “Life at Sea” ship will set sail from Istanbul in November, traveling to 375 destinations, with stops in 135 countries across all seven continents.

title: Russian strikes in Ukraine kill 10 civilians, wound 20 more
description: Ukraine’s presidential office says Russian long-range strikes have killed at least 10 civilians and wounded 20 others in several areas of Ukraine

title: Unwelcome spotlight falls on NHL team Pride night events
description: The National Hockey League's Pride nights are in the spotlight after some high-profile incidents

title: Hong Kong traffic accident leaves some 70 people injured
description: Four passenger buses and a truck have collided near a Hong Kong road tunnel and about 70 people were injured, including children

title: Trump campaign insists he won't be deterred by possible indictment
description: Donald Trump's campaign is looking to keep disruptions to a minimum amid speculation over an upcoming indictment from Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg.

title: China threatens consequences over US warship's actions
description: China is threatening “serious consequences” after the U.S. Navy sailed a destroyer around the disputed Paracel Islands in the South China Sea for the second day in a row, in a move Beijing claims was a violation of its sovereignty and security

title: US military carries out airstrikes in Syria after drone attack kills US contractor
description: The U.S. military carried out airstrikes in Syria after a deadly drone attack killed a U.S. contractor and injured six others, including five American service members.

title: Utah social media law requires parental permission for kids
description: Utah has become the first state to sign into law legislation that attempts to limit teenagers’ access to social media sites

title: N Korea says it simulated nuke attacks with drone, missiles
description: North Korea says its cruise missile launches this week were part of nuclear attack simulations that included a detonation from a purported underwater drone

title: Honolulu police officers plead not guilty in crash, cover-up
description: Four Honolulu police officers are pleading not guilty to charges related to their roles in a cover-up of a high-speed chase that resulted in a crash and a traumatic brain injury to the driver of another car

title: Top Trump attorney appeared before grand jury last December, say sources
description: Trump attorney Timothy Parlatore gave previously undisclosed testimony to a grand jury probing Trump's handling of classified documents, sources tell  ABC News.

title: Florida parents file lawsuit against state transgender youth care ban
description: Florida parents announce lawsuit against state transgender youth care ban.
